title: How to fix video mode not supporter
body: I got a new monitor that is 1024x768 ever since I got a black screen with this box moving around saying video mode not support what do I do?

replies.body:
That can sometimes happen if your game is trying to display at a larger resolution than is supported by your monitor. Do a quick config reset with the steps below and try setting that resolution again.

- Log into the game client
- Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\
- Delete the folder named **Config**
- Go into a practice game and verify that settings have saved properly. 
- Leave game to sync settings
Tried Deleting it when I opened league the client was super sized.

try hooking up another monitor that supports your current resolution setting of your computer(maybe the previous monitor?). Then change the setting to your computers display to the 1024x768 and plug in the new monitor again.
The older monitor broke. so when I grabbed the old one from my basement it didn't support it
